snippet.title: Nugget & Penny’s Adventure Machine | 2020 Trailer
snippet.description:
Game trailer for Nugget & Penny’s Adventure Machine – an energetic CO-OP game for two!
Grab a friend and play Nugget & Penny as they fly into a new adventure.
👾 FREE DOWNLOAD: https://notslot.itch.io/adventure-machine
🎮🕹https://gamejolt.com/games/adventure-machine/428608

Game by: Danielle Elias & Nir Lahad
Original soundtrack: Jason Lord
Advisor: Eric Lerner
A graduation project at Bezalel Academy of Arts and Design

🎧 Trailer soundtrack by Rotem Moav
https://soundcloud.com/rotemcomposer/nugget-penny-ice-world-theme

When the kids' flying machine crashes in an unknown location, 
you and your buddy must cooperate to find all
the missing parts of the Adventure Machine.
In your quest, you might find yourselves surrounded by 
mocking monkeys, tricking a vengeful robot 
or even dodging giants' legs.
